front.title: A P2P CDN based Content Sharing System using PPSP and RELOAD

abstract.t: This document defines a P2P CDN (Content Delivery Network) basedcontent sharing system using PPSP (Peer to Peer Streaming Protocol)and RELOAD (REsource LOcation And Discovery). The P2P CDN provides aunified platform for service/content providers and content sharingusers to share content efficiently and safely. The shared contentsmay include streaming media, files, etc. This content sharing systemuses PPSP as signaling protocol for P2P content distributing, anduses RELOAD to improve reliability and scalability. Morespecifically, RELOAD is used to construct P2P overlays storing ofmassive contents and locating contents reliably.
